title: SDXL Image Generation (Black Cat)
name: sdxl-gen-black-cat
setup: uv pip install torch torchvision diffusers transformers accelerate transformerlab

env_vars.PROMPT: A cinematic close-up photo of a majestic black cat sitting on a mossy stone wall, golden hour lighting, yellow eyes, 8k resolution, photorealistic
env_vars.NEGATIVE_PROMPT: blurry, low quality, distorted, deformed, ugly, cartoon

description: Generates images using Stable Diffusion XL. configured to generate high-quality images of a Black Cat.
